name: Wangshu Inn
description:
End Phase: Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
storytext: "Folk stories also have it that even ones as august as the adepti sometimes bask in the moonlight here."
